:py:mod:`bosk.executor.utility`
===============================

.. py:module:: bosk.executor.utility

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Module containing useful utility functions, which
   can be used by many executors.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   bosk.executor.utility.get_connection_map



.. py:function:: get_connection_map(executor)

   Method that creates :attr:`conn_dict` and checks if every input slot
   has no more than one corresponding output slot.

   :raises AssertionError: If some input slot has more than one corresponding output slot.
